Gaza ceasefire deal eases pressure on Israeli football team ahead of 2026 World Cup
subhead: Israel's national team faces Norway on Saturday in qualifiers for the next World Cup. Suspending the team, a measure discussed in recent weeks, is now no longer on the table since the US's Gaza peace plan came into force.

title: Madagascar soldiers join youth-led demonstrations
subhead: Fresh protests in Antananarivo drew large crowds in one of the biggest gatherings since a protest movement erupted on the Indian Ocean island on September 25. Some soldiers joined after announcing they would refuse any orders to shoot demonstrators.

title: 'The ideological disarmament of religious Zionism is imperative'
subhead: The disarmament of Hamas, which now sees rare international consensus, is indispensable, but it must not conceal another necessary step: disarming religious Zionism, explains Le Monde columnist Gilles Paris.

title: Masses of displaced persons return to northern Gaza amid a landscape of ruins
subhead: Nearly 200,000 Palestinians had returned to the Gaza Strip's north by Friday evening, according to the territory's civil defense service.

subhead: France would fare better than the United Kingdom if bond markets were to turn against countries seen as too lax in managing public finances, writes Isabelle Chaperon, columnist for Le Monde's economy desk.

title: 'One Battle After Another' stirs political passion in the US
subhead: Lauded as a 'rallying cry' by some and denounced as 'glorifying terrorism' by others, the film has been dissected in starkly opposing terms, writes Le Monde's Thomas Sotinel in his column.

title: Matthieu Blazy: 'Just because Karl was a legend does not mean that everyone who designs for Chanel has to be one too'
subhead: The anticipation was overwhelming. But on Monday, the first show by Chanel's new artistic director under the glass roof of the Grand Palais lived up to all expectations. With his impeccable CV and strong personality, the 41-year-old designer has written the first page of a new chapter for the fashion house. His mission? To usher it into a new era without losing its soul.
